requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/ 8/ 10
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT730 or Radeon equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Standard Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Game runs in locked 60fps
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/ 8/ 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT730 or Radeon equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Standard Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Game runs in locked 60fps
